turns.speaker: System
turns.text: Connecting you to a live agent... Connected to Sarah K.

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to send a SEPA transfer and the dashboard is just spinning.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: I'm sorry for the delay, Marcus. I can see your session is active. Are you seeing an error code?

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: No code, just a white screen after I hit 'Confirm Payment'. It's been 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Are you on a mobile device or desktop?

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: Desktop. I tried refreshing, but now it says 'Account Balance Unavailable'.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: That sounds like a sync issue. Let me check the Frankfurt node status...

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: This is urgent. The payment is for a real estate deposit. Is my money gone?

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Your funds are safe. I see a 'PENDING' status on the ledger. We are experiencing regional latency. Ref: TX-EU-7782.

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: How long will it take? I have a deadline by EOD.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Our engineering team is working on it. I'm escalating your specific Transaction ID to the priority queue.

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: Wait, I just got a notification on my phone saying 'Session Expired'. What now?

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Please do not attempt to re-submit the payment. Stay on the line while I verify the Auth handshake.

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: Okay. I'll wait. But please tell them I can't even see my transaction history now.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Understood. That's a known symptom of the current gateway timeout... [TRUNCATED - Turn 15/25]

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: I can't log in. FaceID recognizes me, then it just sends me back to the login screen.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Hello Elena. Did you recently update your phone software?

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: Yes, I updated to iOS 19.1 last night. It worked fine before that.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: We've had several reports of this. Does it give you an option to use a PIN?

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: No, it just flashes the FaceID icon and then kicks me out. It's an infinite loop.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Try force-closing the app and clearing the cache in Settings.

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: I did that. I even reinstalled the app. Still the same issue. Error BIO-FAIL-909.

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: Thank you for that error code. That confirms a mismatch with our current SDK... [TRUNCATED - Turn 12/20]
